body.p: Granted these are from the time of different screen sizes and at least seven years old but I worked with what I had at a public university to create instructions for graduate students to aid in the formatting and submission of electronic theses and dissertations (ETD). All the following videos were produced with Camtasia screen capture software.
The proceeding video tutorial assists students with sign-up for the university's institutional repository so the student can submit the ETD.
This next video assists students who may not be familiar with Microsoft Word with how to generate a table of contents automatically.

This last video example assists students with their signature page, which is an important page showing the sign-off after a successful defense. This video also demonstrates how I made the signature page into a form template to help students incorporate it without mistakes.
